input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product specification.

Product specification:
Stero Dishwasher P56-1684 22-5/8"X17" Curtain 

Product keywords:
Genuine OEM replacement part
Stero was founded over 60-years ago in the restaurant mecca of San Francisco and manufactures dishwashers that get the job done
Use genuine OEM parts for safety reliability and performance

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This is a dishwasher part. It was made by Stero, a company that makes dishwashers. It is a replacement part, so you should only use it if your dishwasher is broken. Using the right parts for your dishwasher is important for it to work properly and safely.
input_text.Response B: This is a genuine OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) replacement part. OEM parts are manufactured by the original equipment manufacturer for the product you own. Stero is a manufacturer of commercial dishwashers. This door gasket is used on a Stero dishwasher. This specific part is approximately 22-5/8" wide by 17" tall.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.factors_a: Response A only touches on the maker of the replacement part, then goes on to talk about broken washing machines instead of detailed description.
label_annotations.factors_b: Response b gives the measurements and other helpful detail.
